chipmunk.description: Lattice-based multi-signature scheme - CRITICAL INTEGRATION ISSUES

crypto_specific_guidelines.based_on_chipmunk_integration: Proven patterns from successful Chipmunk implementation

callback_registration.description: All crypto algorithms must register callbacks in s_callbacks[] array in dap_enc_key.c
required_callbacks: new_callback - Key generation from random seed
deser_sign_size - Calculate signature size for unserialized output
callback_registration.critical_note: Missing any callback will cause runtime crashes in main crypto test suite

signature_function_conventions.sign_get_return: Must return 0 on successful signature creation, negative error code on failure
signature_function_conventions.sign_verify_return: Must return 0 on successful verification, negative error code on failure
signature_function_conventions.memory_management: All signature data must be managed through DAP_NEW/DAP_DELETE macros

switch_statement_coverage.description: All switch statements handling signature types must include new algorithm case
mandatory_locations: dap_sign.c: dap_sign_type_from_key_type() - Map key type to signature type
dap_sign.c: dap_sign_type_to_key_type() - Map signature type to key type
dap_sign.c: signature verification switch - Verification dispatcher
switch_statement_coverage.requirement: Missing any switch case will cause 'missing support' runtime errors

deterministic_key_generation.requirement: All signature algorithms should support both random and seed-based key generation
deterministic_key_generation.pattern: algorithm_keypair() for random, algorithm_keypair_from_seed() for deterministic
deterministic_key_generation.use_case: Deterministic keys enable reproducible testing and wallet key derivation

integration_testing.main_suite: Must pass all tests in crypto/test/crypto/crypto-test executable
integration_testing.coverage: Algorithm must work with existing DAP encryption framework without modifications

unit_testing.algorithm_specific: Separate test files for algorithm internals (e.g., chipmunk_hots_test.c)

serialization_testing.requirement: Must support full serialize/deserialize cycle for keys and signatures
serialization_testing.test_coverage: Both binary serialization and DAP protocol serialization

performance_guidelines.memory_efficiency: Minimize heap allocations in signature operations
performance_guidelines.security_practices: Use secure memory clearing for private keys
performance_guidelines.debugging_support: Include conditional debug logging for troubleshooting integration issues
